findings.title: OWNER PRIVILEGED ROLES CAN MODIFY MULTIPLE VARIABLES OF THE CONTRACT
findings.description: The owner privileged role can modify multiple variables such as collateral Token, reward Token, and reward factor, which may cause issues if the privileged role is maliciously controlled.

findings.title: UNRESTRICTED COOLDOWN TIME WHEN COLLECTING REWARDS
findings.description: The applyClaim method records user's balance and rewards and cooling time, but there is no limit to the claim_interval variable which can cause principal and reward not being taken out in time.
